title: unban ME  its been 2 years :(
body: man i havent played this game for years cuz i got perma banned over the most stupid shit, i kinda miss it and want my account back. i was trolled ingame and forced to be toxic, i consulted the guy who trolled me after and he admitted he was trying to tilt me and i got permad cuz of it, cmon riot i love yall man

replies.body:
Unless you are a famous streamer (thinking Tyler1), its probably not gonna happen. The other option could be to invest millions into Riot, buy your way in. But in reality the best way would be to make a new account, call it "8 inches long xd" and just play on that one. Seems quicker.
If you get that one banned, make a new account called "7 inches long xd", just chop an inch off each time for punishment.

Tyler1 never had any accounts unbanned. 

His lifetime *player* ban was revoked because it was decided it didn't line up with Riot's fundamental goals for the punishment system, but he *never* regained access to any accounts that were previously perma-banned.

A ban will only ever be removed if it was made in error. If you feel it was applied incorrectly you can appeal the punishment through player support: https://support-leagueoflegends.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

While I don't know the specifics of your punishment, it's worth noting that it doesn't matter who started it. If you continue it, you face punishment as well. Like the age-old adage "two wrongs don't make a right".
